translation_en: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]
translation_id: Apabila matahari digulung,

translation_en: And when the stars fall, dispersing,
translation_id: apabila bintang-bintang berjatuhan,

translation_en: And when the mountains are removed
translation_id: apabila gunung-gunung dihancurkan,

translation_en: And when full-term she-camels are neglected
translation_id: apabila unta-unta yang bunting ditinggalkan (tidak terurus),

translation_en: And when the wild beasts are gathered
translation_id: apabila binatang-binatang liar dikumpulkan,

translation_en: And when the seas are filled with flame
translation_id: apabila lautan dipanaskan,

translation_en: And when the souls are paired
translation_id: apabila roh-roh dipertemukan (dengan tubuh),

translation_en: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked
translation_id: apabila bayi-bayi perempuan yang dikubur hidup-hidup ditanya,

translation_en: For what sin she was killed
translation_id: “Karena dosa apa dia dibunuh,”

translation_en: And when the pages are made public
translation_id: apabila lembaran-lembaran (catatan amal) telah dibuka lebar-lebar,

translation_en: And when the sky is stripped away
translation_id: apabila langit dilenyapkan,

translation_en: And when Hellfire is set ablaze
translation_id: apabila (neraka) Jahim dinyalakan,

translation_en: And when Paradise is brought near,
translation_id: dan apabila surga didekatkan,

translation_en: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].
translation_id: setiap jiwa akan mengetahui apa yang telah dikerjakannya.

translation_en: So I swear by the retreating stars -
translation_id: Aku bersumpah demi bintang-bintang

translation_en: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -
translation_id: yang beredar lagi terbenam,

translation_en: And by the night as it closes in
translation_id: demi malam apabila telah larut,

translation_en: And by the dawn when it breathes
translation_id: demi subuh apabila (fajar) telah menyingsing,

translation_en: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger
translation_id: sesungguhnya (Al-Qur’an) itu benar-benar firman (Allah yang dibawa oleh) utusan yang mulia (Jibril)

arabic: ذِيْ قُوَّةٍ عِنْدَ ذِى الْعَرْشِ مَكِيْنٍۙ
translation_en: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],
translation_id: yang memiliki kekuatan dan kedudukan tinggi di sisi (Allah) yang memiliki ʻArasy,

translation_en: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.
translation_id: yang di sana (Jibril) ditaati lagi dipercaya.

translation_en: And your companion is not [at all] mad.
translation_id: Temanmu (Nabi Muhammad) itu bukanlah orang gila.

transliteration_en: Wa laqad ra aahu bilufuqil mubeen
translation_en: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.
translation_id: Sungguh, dia (Nabi Muhammad) benar-benar telah melihatnya (Jibril) di ufuk yang terang.

translation_en: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.
translation_id: Dia (Nabi Muhammad) bukanlah seorang yang kikir (enggan) untuk menerangkan yang gaib.

transliteration_en: Wa maa huwa biqawli shaitaanir rajeem
transliteration_id: Wa mā huwa biqauli syaiṭānir rajīm(in).
translation_en: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].
translation_id: (Al-Qur’an) itu bukanlah perkataan setan yang terkutuk.

translation_en: So where are you going?
translation_id: Maka, ke manakah kamu akan pergi?

translation_en: It is not except a reminder to the worlds
translation_id: (Al-Qur’an) itu tidak lain, kecuali peringatan bagi semesta alam,

translation_en: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.
translation_id: (yaitu) bagi siapa di antaramu yang hendak menempuh jalan yang lurus.

arabic: وَمَا تَشَاۤءُوْنَ اِلَّآ اَنْ يَّشَاۤءَ اللّٰهُ رَبُّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Wa maa tashaaa'oona illaaa ai yashaaa 'al laahu Rabbul 'Aalameen
transliteration_id: Wa mā tasyā'ūna illā ay yasyā'allāhu rabbul-‘ālamīn(a).
translation_en: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.
translation_id: Kamu tidak dapat berkehendak, kecuali apabila dikehendaki Allah, Tuhan semesta alam.
